name: dev.ucp.shopping.catalog.lookup
title: Catalog Lookup
description: Product/variant lookup by identifier. Supports batch retrieval (lookup_catalog) and single-product detail (get_product).

lookup_request.description: Request body for batch catalog lookup.

ids.description: Identifiers to lookup. Implementations MUST support product ID and variant ID; MAY support secondary identifiers (SKU, handle, etc.).

lookup_variant.description: A variant in a lookup response, extended with input correlation.

input.description: Which request identifiers resolved to this variant, and how.

lookup_product.description: A product in a lookup response, with variants carrying input correlation.

variants.description: Purchasable variants with lookup input correlation. First item is the featured variant.

products.description: Products matching the requested identifiers. May contain fewer items if some identifiers not found, or more if identifiers match multiple products.

messages.description: Errors, warnings, or informational messages about the requested items.

get_product_request.description: Request body for single-product retrieval with optional option selection.

id.description: Product or variant identifier. Implementations MUST support product ID and variant ID.

selected.description: Partial or full option selections for interactive variant narrowing. When provided, response option values include availability signals (available, exists) relative to these selections.

preferences.description: Option names in relaxation priority order. When no exact variant matches all selections, the server drops options from the end of this list first. E.g., ['Color', 'Size'] keeps Color and relaxes Size.

detail_product.description: A product in a get_product response, extended with effective selections.

selected.description: Effective option selections after any relaxation. Present when the request includes selected options.

product.description: The requested product with full detail. Singular â€” this is a single-resource operation.

messages.description: Warnings or informational messages about the product (e.g., price recently changed, limited availability).
